marklogic.body:
The Republicans discovered the of Acting like nutterz when they became desperate enough (after the 2008 crash) to rally the die-hard xenophobes & religious literalists in order to exploit the town-and-country divide in our (antiquated) system of single-member districts. It's kept their big fat feet in the house, despite their obvious misfeasance & failure in stewardship during the lead-up to the 2008 crash ( allowing a debt bubble commensurate with a fast offshoring of commodity manufacturing ).
This GOP is now both mentally and ethically bankrupt, and nothing evinced that more than Phil Gramm when he described the increasing ranks of the unemployed as Cry-babies. Oh, that, and the McCain ticket's choice of a VPOTUS in Sarah Palin (telegenic cheerleader).
